text:
According to the @CDCgov, if you have acute symptomatic #COVID19, you should postpone #vaccination. Also, likelihood of #sarscov2 reinfection within 90 days of the first disease is low, thus supporting the #vaccine delay. 

CDC: https://t.co/XVdrVG8Z8K

#medicine #coronavirus https://t.co/GyfIMnAPbD
